name: Sinlap City
description:
A small top down survival game me and a few other people made for a school project. 

Credits:

Programming: Christian Smith, Ethan Seem, Seth Perry

Art: Rose Christman, Brian Bland, Morgan Austin

This game was a one off project, we did a fairly good job fixing bugs but i will not be updating the game in case any new bugs are discovered. However I intend to make more games in the future so look out for those if you like this game.
